sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-app>
    <!-- Navigation Drawer (Left Sidebar) -->
    <v-navigation-drawer app permanent>
      <v-list dense>
        <v-list-item-group>
          <v-list-item>
            <v-list-item-content>
              <v-list-item-title>Trang chủ</v-list-item-title>
            </v-list-item-content>
          </v-list-item>

          <v-list-item>
            <v-list-item-content>
              <v-list-item-title>Phòng</v-list-item-title>
            </v-list-item-content>
          </v-list-item>

          <v-list-item>
            <v-list-item-content>
              <v-list-item-title>Dịch vụ</v-list-item-title>
            </v-list-item-content>
          </v-list-item>

          <!-- Add more list items as needed -->
        </v-list-item-group>
      </v-list>
    </v-navigation-drawer>

    <!-- Main Content Area -->
    <v-main>
      <!-- Top Bar -->
      <v-app-bar app>
        <v-spacer></v-spacer>
        <v-btn icon>
          <v-icon>mdi-account</v-icon>
        </v-btn>
        <v-btn icon>
          <v-icon>mdi-settings</v-icon>
        </v-btn>
      </v-app-bar>

      <!-- Content -->
      <v-container>
        <v-row>
          <v-col cols="12">
            <v-text-field label="Tìm kiếm" prepend-inner-icon="mdi-magnify"></v-text-field>
          </v-col>
          <v-col cols="12">
            <v-btn color="primary">Nhập phòng từ excel</v-btn>
            <v-btn color="secondary">Khách thuê</v-btn>
            <v-btn color="info">Phòng</v-btn>
            <v-btn color="success">Thêm nhà</v-btn>
          </v-col>
        </v-row>

        <v-row>
          <v-col cols="12" sm="4" md="3">
            <v-card>
              <v-card-title>Phòng 1</v-card-title>
              <v-card-subtitle>Giá: 3,000,000 VND</v-card-subtitle>
              <v-card-actions>
                <v-btn text color="primary">Thêm khách</v-btn>
                <v-btn text color="warning">Chỉnh sửa</v-btn>
                <v-btn text color="error">Xóa</v-btn>
              </v-card-actions>
            </v-card>
          </v-col>

          <!-- Repeat the card structure for more rooms -->
        </v-row>
      </v-container>
    </v-main>
  </v-app>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: 'RoomManagement',
};
</script>

<style scoped>
/* Custom styling if needed */
</style>
